works.description:
Tutorial written by us ("Como Gravar Conversas  
Telefônicas no PC") that someone is putting for download as a .rar file.  

Note the red image "ESTE ARTIGO É UMA CÓPIA NÃO AUTORIZADA DO SITE CLUBE
DO  
HARDWARE", which is the image our server send whenever someone is stealing
 
an image hosted with us. Thanks.
